participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Determined and hardworking, Emily is ambitious about her future in law and passionate about equestrian life.
participant_1.background: i'm from a small town. i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i was raised on a horse farm.

participant_2.name: Michael Johnson
participant_2.personality: Friendly and patient, Michael enjoys spending time with his family and takes pride in coaching young athletes.
participant_2.background: i coach little league baseball. i've five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage. i drive a mini van. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
